title: Home
artist: Edward Sharpe and The Magnetic Zeros
lyrics:
[intro] (Bm) (D) | (D) (G) x2
 
[girls] (Bm)Alabama, Arkansas (D)I do love my ma and pa
(D)Not the way that I do love (G)you
[boys] Well, (Bm)holy moley, me-oh-my! (D)You're the apple of my eye
(D)Girl I've never loved one like (G)you
 
[girls] (Bm)Man oh man you're my best friend, I (D)scream it to the nothingness
(D) There ain't nothing that I (G)need
[boys] Well (Bm)hot and heavy, pumpkin pie, (D)chocolate candy, Jesus Christ
(D)There ain't nothing please me more than (G)you
 
[chorus, together]
Oh (Bm)home, let me come (D)home
(D)Home is wherever I'm with (G)you
Oh (Bm)home, let me go ho-(D)-o-ome
(D)Home is wherever I'm with (G)you
 
[bridge, together]
(Em) (Em) (D) (A) (A) Hey!
(Em) (Em) (D) (A)
(Em) (Em) (D) (G) (G)
(Bm)La la (A)la la (D)take me (G)home (G)
(A)Mother, I'm com-ing home [pause]
(Bm) (D) | (D) (G) x2
 
[boys] I'll (Bm)follow you into the park (D)through the jungle through the dark
(D)Girl I never loved one like (G)you
[girls] (Bm)Moats and boats and waterfalls (D)alleyways and pay phone calls
(D) I've been everywhere with (G)you, [boys]that’s true!
 
[boys] We (Bm)laugh until we think we’ll die (D)barefoot on a summer night
(D)Nothin’ new is sweeter than with (G)you
[girls] And (Bm)in the streets you run afree (D)like it's only you and me
[together] (D)Geeze, you're something (G)to see
 
[chorus, together]
Oh (Bm)home, let me come (D)home
(D)Home is wherever I'm with (G)you
Oh (Bm)home, let me go ho-(D)-o-ome
(D)Home is wherever I'm with (G)you
 
[bridge, together]
(Em) (Em) (D) (A) (A) Hey!
(Em) (Em) (D) (A)
(Em) (Em) (D) (G) (G)
(Bm)La la (A)la la (D)take me (G)home (G)
(A)Mother, I'm com-ing home [pause]
(Bm) (D) | (D) (G) x2
 
[chorus, together]
Oh (Bm)home, let me come (D)home
(D)Home is wherever I'm with (G)you
Oh (Bm)home, let me go ho-(D)-o-ome
(D)Home is wherever I'm with (G)you
 
[single strums]
[boys] (Bm)Home, let me come (D)home
(D)Home is wherever I'm with (G)you
[girls] Oh (Bm)home, yes I am (D)ho-o-ome
(D)Home is when I'm alone with (G)you
 
(Bm)Alabama, Arkansa-a-a-a-as (D)
(D)I do love my ma and pa-a-a-a (G)
(Bm)Moats and boats and water(D)falls
(D)Alleyways and pay phone calls (G)
 
[boys] (Bm)Home... (D)home
(D)Home is when I'm alone with (G)you
(Bm)Home... (D)home
(D)Home is when I'm alone with (G)you
[END]
